isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - RANGE CYLINDER

step1.para: Install O-ring in slot of small bore in cylinder. Apply silicone to all O-rings (inset, Figure 233).

figure.caption: Figure 233. Install O-Ring in Slot of Small Bore and Apply Silicone

step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-rings in the I.D. and O.D. of the range piston ( Figure 234).

figure.caption: Figure 234. Install O-Rings in I.D. and O.D. of Range Piston

step1.para: Position new gasket on housing ( Figure 235). Install range cylinder, piston yoke, piston and retaining nut into housing. Tighten nut to 70 to 85 ft-lbs. (95 to 115 N·m). Apply Loctite 242 or equivalent to the bolt threads. Install the bolts into range cylinder housing and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 235. Position New Gasket on Housing

step1.para: Place range cylinder cover and new gasket on range cylinder ( Figure 236). Apply Loctite 242 or equivalent to the bolt threads. Install the bolts and tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 236. Place Range Cylinder Cover and New Gasket on Range Cylinder
